Hello,
I get the following error in case there is/are breakpoint(s) in the breakpoints view from projects not being debugged. Problem is due to the line fBreakpointIds.put(breakpoint, getData().getMIBreakpoints()[0].getNumber()); where getMIBreakpoints() method returns an empty array.

Also, We are queuing command even if the resource isnt a member of current debug target. 

Here is the output from the console
